channel.title: ABAPGit on Pawel Wiejkut
channel.description: Recent content in ABAPGit on Pawel Wiejkut

item.title: How to contribute ABAP projects on Github
item.description: Last time, when I published my bw_toolbox project on Github, there were a lot of questions from regular developers not so much familiar with git, how they can contribute. Because of that, I decided to write this quick-start tutorial. What do I need? – system requirements Connection with GitHub – your instance should be able to establish a connection with github.com, SSL Entires – you have to configure your SAP System by adding necessary certificates into STRUST transaction (details), Profile configuration – also changes on the profile level are required, so you have to manual edit entries or use transactions (details).
